subject: Christmas Eve Special---LIVE GHOST BOX FEED 6pm est.
author: Urkel23
full_text:
For a special treat for the holidays, i will be broadcasting a LIVE feed of one of my ghost boxes for 6 hours.

Whether you are with the family or alone, just tune in and listen to the ghost box at your leisure.

Maybe record a segment while asking questions to see what you get.  I will leave this up from 6pm-12am est. tonight on christmas eve.

Get the family together and tune in to ask the ghost box questions, who knows what you may get.

Here is how to tune in:

http://www.stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html

There will also be an interactive chat, so people could also talk to one another.

Enjoy and Happy Holidays !

-Steve H.
